channel.title: Cobalt Ring & small pearl
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Cobalt Ring & small pearl" - new items

item.title: Re: Cobalt Ring & small pearl
item.content:encoded: Thanks, I'll get that up soon, seeing as I seem to be the point-man for wastelands wiki updates.

item.title: Cobalt Ring & small pearl
item.content:encoded:
Found Ash-Covered Ring that identified as
Cobalt Ring: 1 (Currently sells for 5100) Treasure Item
Also found Small Pearl: 1 (Currently sells for 510) Treasure Item can't remember what it was or if it needed identification at all.
Neither can be used as ingredient or distill.
Couldn't find those on site.
